title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-1.3 - Times and places for inspecting records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-1.3 - Times and places for inspecting records

State Regulations
(a) Records shall be available for inspection and copying by members of the public and members of the news media on every day that the offices of the department are open for the transaction of business between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and 4:45 p.m. (b) Records may be inspected at locations designated by the appropriate records access officer, whose titles and business addresses are as set forth in section 50-14 Of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
